sourcesContent:
import React, {useContext} from 'react' import {SampleData} from './SampleData' import {Link, Switch, Route} from 'react-router-dom' import {Context} from './Context' const WatchList = (item) => { const {itemFetch, WatchList} = useContext(Context) let endingTime = item.endtime.toString() let endingTime1 = endingTime.substring( endingTime.lastIndexOf("P") + 1, endingTime.lastIndexOf("D")) let endingTime2 = endingTime.substring( endingTime.lastIndexOf("T") + 1, endingTime.lastIndexOf("H")) let endingTime3 = endingTime.substring( endingTime.lastIndexOf("H") + 1, endingTime.lastIndexOf("M")) // let endingTime1 = endingTime.substring(endingTime.toString().lastIndexOf("P") + 1, endingTime.toString().lastIndexOf("D")) // let timeleft = endTime.toString().substring(0, endTime.lastIndexOf("D")) // console.log(endingTime1 + "ayy") return (

{item.title}

{item.condition}

${item.CurrPrice}

+ Shipping

type of auction

{endingTime1}d {endingTime2}h {endingTime3}M left

) } const ImageContainer = { backgroundColor:'white', display: 'block', width:'17.8vw', height:'24.5vh', marginLeft:'3%', // borderWidth:'thin', // borderColor:'black', // borderStyle:'solid', boxShadow: '0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 6px 20px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.19)', backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat', textAlign:'center', backgroundSize: 'contain', backgroundPosition: 'center' } const ImageStyle = { display: 'flex', resizeMode: 'contain', resizeImage: 'contain', marginRight: 'auto', marginLeft:'auto', maxWidth: '100%', // width:'auto', maxHeight: '100%', backgroundColor:'white' } export default WatchList
